attributes.action: review disability living allowence for people with long term incurable conditions:-M.S.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As A Multiple Sclerosis Nurse specialist I am amazed at the inconsistancys when this benefit is assessed/allocated.
Its aim is to help people with long term conditions, yet the criteria seems to change from person to person.
Some are even asked too reapply every 2 years!!! Why is there a cure?that we are not being told about!
 If you have ms you have ms.
Are you aware of the extreme stress and anxiety reapplying causes?
I would ask the prime-minister to review the award criteria for longterm conditions,and also the
assessment criteria.
I am sure that alot of money would be saved from not reassessing and having doctors assessments 2 yearly.
